title: Pentakill Karthus Glitch
body: The Pentakill Karthus skin doesnt play any of the quotes PERIOD. I've gone into multiple games and it doesnt play any quotes at all. Please fix this, thank you.

replies.body: Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are looking into it!

If the issue can be fixed in time Katey, do you know if it will be hotfixed? 

I ask because while an issue like this isn't gamebreaking, I think the VO of a champion (*especially* someone like Karthus) is a pretty relevant and valued part of their kit and character.

Not sure about a hotfix. I agree it's not a great bug hanging around. D: I do know the team is working to resolve this. I just checked on live, and it appears there was a patch, but Karthus is still a bit hoarse and doesn't have his VO back just yet.
This isn't a skin based glitch. It's a Karthus glitch. There's been countless threads already started that have notified Riot of this issue.
